EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_JK_DS-Cybersecurity_Q117.SWMY 1-26-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry you missed Data Science for Cybersecurity Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're sorry you missed our webinar, Data Science for Cybersecurity: Detecting Anomalous User Behavior within a Large Enterprise. You can, however, watch the replay of the webinar on-demand at your leisure and download the slide deck using the links below:
- Watch the webinar recording <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]> - Download the webinar presentation <[[http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/using-data-science-for-cybersecurity]]>
Additional data science and analytics resources:
- Download: Greenplum Database <[[http://greenplum.org/]]> and Apache MADlib (incubating) <[[http://madlib.incubator.apache.org/]]> - Data Sheet: Pivotal's Approach to Threat Detection: Cybersecurity Analytics at Scale <[[https://pivotal.io/securityanalytics]]> - Blog: Sequential Pattern Mining Approach for Watering Hole Attack Detection <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/case-studies/sequential-pattern-mining-approach-for-watering-hole-attack-detection-2]]> - Podcast: Don’t Let Your Data Science Models Die A Lonely PowerPoint Death <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/09-dont-let-your-data-science-models-die-a-lonely-powerpoint-death]]>
And don’t miss future data science, big data and analytics webinars and other events from Pivotal. Check Pivotal’s upcoming webinars here <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/1/webinars]]>.
If you would like more information or have any questions about data science and analytics, submit your question and contact information at pivotal.io/contact <[[http://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
